nodes.text: Kappa was a group of five Lambda-class T-4a shuttles that served in the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

They transferred Sian Tevv and Sullustan officers to the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Invincible after they were captured by stormtroopers during the Diplomatic Summit at Sullust. The shuttles were attacked by Rebel pilots, including Keyan Farlander, and the Sullustans were rescued before they reached the Invincible.
